Name: BfsMedstats17Admitsource
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 17 1.2.V02 - Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt / Séjour avant l’admission / Luogo di soggiorno prima dell’ammissione
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Unmittelbarer Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt. Wo befand sich BFS der Patient / die Patientin?

Name: BfsMedstats18Admittype
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 18 1.2.V03 - Eintrittsart / Mode d’admission / Genere di ricovero
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Beschreibung der Umstände des Eintritts. Wie wurde der BFS Patient / die Patientin aufgenommen?

Name: BfsMedstats19Admitrole
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 19 1.2.V04 - Einweisende Instanz / Décision d’envoi / Istanza ricoverante
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Unmittelbarer Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt. Wo befand sich BFS der Patient / die Patientin?

Name: BfsMedstats20Encounterclass
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 20 1.3.V01 - Behandlungsart / Type de prise en charge / Genere di trattamento
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Angabe der Behandlungsart

Name: BfsMedstats21Encountertype
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 21 1.3.V02 - Klasse / Classe / Classe
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Im Rahmen des Spitalaufenthaltes belegte Liegeklasse, nicht BFS die Versicherungskategorie. Bei Wechsel der Klasse ist die im Wesentlichen beanspruchte Klasse anzugeben.

Name: BfsMedstats27Dischargedecision
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 27 1.5.V02 - Entscheid für Austritt / Décision de sortie / Décisione dell’uscita
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Wer hat den Klinikaustritt veranlasst?

Name: BfsMedstats28Dischargedestination
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 28 1.5.V03 - Aufenthalt nach Austritt / Séjour après la sortie / Destinazione dopo l’uscita
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Wohin wurde der Patient entlassen?

Name: BfsMedstats29Dischargeencounter
Title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 29 1.5.V04 - Behandlung nach Austritt / Prise en charge après la sortie / Trattamento dopo l’uscita
Descriptino: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Behandlung, Pflege, Rehabilitation nach dem Spitalaufenthalt. Es geht darum, den Behandlungserfolg resp. den Abhängigkeitsgrad bei Austritt anzugeben. Nur die am besten zutreffende Kategorie auswählen.

Name: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
Title: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter. In Switzerland the primary care physician is added to the extensible base ValueSet.

Name: ChCoreMaritalStatus
Title: ChCoreMaritalStatus
Descriptino: MaritalStatus combined by fhir and eCH-11. See [maritalData - Zivilstandsangaben eCH-11](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.349276.html) and/or [BFS Amtlicher Katalog der Merkmale](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.349276.html).

Name: ECH10AddressLine
Title: eCH-010 Address Line Type
Descriptino: eCH-010 defines different address lines (addressLine1,2 and street)

Name: ECH11FirstNameDataTypes
Title: eCH-011 FirstNameDataTypes
Descriptino: eCH-011 defines different nameData Types, this ValueSet is the subset for the firstnames

Name: ECH11MaritaldataSeparation
Title: eCH-011 MaritalData Separation
Descriptino: eCH-011 defines maritalData separation types

Name: ECH11MaritalStatus
Title: eCH-011 MaritalStatus
Descriptino: eCH-011 defines maritalStaus Types

Name: ECH11NameDataTypes
Title: eCH-011 NameDataTypes
Descriptino: eCH-011 defines different nameData Types, this ValueSet is the subset for the family name

Name: ECH11Sex
Title: eCH-011 Sex
Descriptino: eCH-011 defines these sex types

Name: ECH46EmailCategory
Title: eCH-0046 Email Category
Descriptino: eCH-0046 defines these types of e-mail categories

Name: ECH46InternetCategory
Title: eCH-0046 Internet Category
Descriptino: eCH-0046 defines these types of internet categories

Name: ECH46PhoneCategory
Title: eCH-0046 Phone Category
Descriptino: eCH-0046 defines these types of phone categories

Name: ECH007CantonAbbreviation
Title: eCH-0007 Canton Abbreviation
Descriptino: eCH-0007: Each municipality has a unique cantonal affiliation, which can be defined by the cantonal abbreviation commonly used in Switzerland.

Name: ECH007CantonFLAbbreviation
Title: eCH-0007 Canton Abbreviation incl. FL (Fürstentum Liechtenstein)
Descriptino: eCH-0007: Analogous to cantonAbbreviation, but contains the entry 'FL' for the Principality of Liechtenstein in addition to the actual cantons.

Name: DocumentEntryClassCode
Title: DocumentEntry.classCode
Descriptino: Document class as per EPRO-FDHA Annex 3

Name: DocumentEntryConfidentialityCode
Title: DocumentEntry.confidentialityCode
Descriptino: Document confidentiality as per Annex; EPRO-FDHA.

Name: DocumentEntryFormatCode
Title: DocumentEntry.formatCode
Descriptino: Document format as per Annex; EPRO-FDHA.         This unambiguous code defines the format of the XDS document. Together with the mimetype, this should provide the potential consumer with sufficient information as to whether they are in a position to process the document.

Name: DocumentEntryHealthcareFacilityTypeCode
Title: DocumentEntry.healthcareFacilityTypeCode
Descriptino: Type of healthcare facility as per Annex 3; EPRO-FDHA.       This code describes the type of healthcare facility in which the document was compiled during the treatment process. In conjunction with the authorisation control, the patient can use this information to assign all documents from a specific type of healthcare facility to a specific confidentiality level in their rights and attributes, for example.

Name: DocumentEntryLanguageCode
Title: DocumentEntry.languageCode
Descriptino: Document language as per Annex 3 EPRO-FDHA. Defines the language in which the document was written.

Name: DocumentEntryPracticeSettingCode
Title: DocumentEntry.practiceSettingCode
Descriptino: Medical specialisation of the data captured in the document as per Annex 3; EPRO-FDHA.       This attribute assigns the contents of a document to a medical specialisation. It is conceivable that this information will assist the patient with setting or changing the confidentiality level of documents, which is relevant for controlling access.

Name: DocumentEntryTypeCode
Title: DocumentEntry.typeCode
Descriptino: Type of document as per Annex 3 EPRO-FDHA.     The code defines a document’s type (e.g. discharge report, laboratory report). Each document type should be assigned to precisely one document class.

Name: HCProfessionalHcProfession
Title: HCProfessional.hcProfession
Descriptino: HCProfessional.hcProfession

Name: HCProfessionalHcSpecialisation
Title: HCProfessional.hcSpecialisation
Descriptino: HCProfessional.hcSpecialisation

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: ContactPointUse
Title: ContactPointUse
Descriptino: Use of contact point.

Name: DocumentRelationshipType
Title: DocumentRelationshipType
Descriptino: The type of relationship between documents.

Name: ParticipantType
Title: Participant type
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

Name: Marital Status Codes
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: ActEncounterCode
Title: ActEncounterCode
Descriptino: Domain provides codes that qualify the ActEncounterClass (ENC)

Name: v3.ConfidentialityClassification
Title: V3 Value SetConfidentialityClassification
Descriptino: Set of codes used to value Act.Confidentiality and Role.Confidentiality attribute in accordance with the definition for concept domain "Confidentiality".
